overview: Dana is a young girl at a pivotal time in her life; she is beginning to have feelings for women. Troubled by her innate yearning to be held by a woman, Dana turns to the church for guidance and help. Her decision to seek God, rather than follow her heart will send her on an emotional roller-coaster, and reveal the teachings of hate in today's society. In the end, Dana will challenge the teachings, and blossom into the woman she was destined to be.
title: Kisses In The Wind
